narrative.title: Trento Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Divisione Motorizzata (Motorized Division) deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Motorized infantry division for mobile operations and defensive operations
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Rocky ridge and desert plain (Miteirya Ridge position at El Alamein), exposed terrain vulnerable to artillery

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Motorized artillery for responsive fire support
